Lyric:
[by:Soom-]
[00:00.83]I thought that I've been hurt before
[00:06.53]But no one's ever left me quite this sore
[00:13.31]Your words cut deeper than a knife
[00:18.87]Now I need someone to breathe me back to life
[00:26.21]Got a feeling that I'm going under
[00:29.10]But I know that I'll make it out alive
[00:32.70]If I quit calling you my lover
[00:35.90]Move on
[00:37.55]You watch me bleed till I can't breathe
[00:41.14]shaking, falling onto my knees
[00:44.33]And now that I'm without your kisses
[00:48.38]I'll be needing stitches
[00:51.63]Tripping over myself
[00:54.02]Aching, begging you to come help
[00:57.29]And now that I'm without your kisses
[01:01.39]I'll be needing stitches
[01:05.03]Just like a moth drawn to a flame
[01:10.91]Oh, you lured me in, I couldn't sense the pain
[01:17.90]Your bitter heart cold to a touch
[01:23.76]Now I'm gonna reap what I sow
[01:26.75]I'm left seeing red on my own
[01:31.27]Got a feeling that I'm going under
[01:34.37]But I know that I'll make it out alive
[01:37.70]If I quit calling you my lover
[01:40.79]Move on
[01:43.10]You watch me bleed till I can't breathe
[01:46.00]shaking, falling onto my knees
[01:49.26]And now that I'm without your kisses
[01:53.36]I'll be needing stitches
[01:56.49]Tripping over myself
[01:58.96]Aching, begging you to come help
[02:02.20]cause now that I'm without your kisses
[02:06.21]I'll be needing stitches
[02:16.47]Needle and a thread, gotta get you out of my head
[02:19.16]Needle and a thread, gonna wind up dead
[02:22.41]Needle and a thread, gotta get you out of my head
[02:25.51]Needle and a thread, gonna wind up dead
[02:28.80]Needle and a thread, gotta get you out of my head
[02:32.04]Needle and a thread, gonna wind up dead
[02:35.18]Needle and a thread, gotta get you out of my head, get you out of my head
[02:40.60]You watch me bleed until I can't breathe
[02:44.00]Shaking, falling onto my knees
[02:47.36]And now that I'm without your kisses
[02:51.44]I'll be needing stitches
[02:54.69]Tripping over myself
[02:57.09]I'm aching, begging you to come help
[03:00.28]cause now that I'm without your kisses
[03:04.36]I'll be needing stitches
[03:07.86]I'm without your kisses
[03:10.96]I'll be needing stitches
